message_1: Let X be a smooth quadric hypersurface in projective 3-space given by the equation X²₀ + X²₁ + X²₂ + X²₃ = 0. Find the minimal resolution of singularities of X.
message_2: Since X is given as a smooth quadric hypersurface, it means that it has no singularities. In other words, X is already a smooth variety. Therefore, the minimal resolution of singularities of X is X itself. There is no need to resolve any singularities, as there are none present in this case.
